TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ALListenerf extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: A list of valid 32-Bits Float Listener/GetListener parameters

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.ALListenerf EfxMetersPerUnit = int32(131076)

Docs.summary: (EFX Extension) This setting is critical if Air Absorption effects are enabled because the amount of Air Absorption applied is directly related to the real-world distance between the Source and the Listener. centimeters 0.01f meters 1.0f kilometers 1000.0f Range [float.MinValue .. float.MaxValue] Default: 1.0f

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.ALListenerf Gain = int32(4106)

Docs.summary: Indicate the gain (Volume amplification) applied. Type: float Range: [0.0f - ? ] A value of 1.0 means un-attenuated/unchanged. Each division by 2 equals an attenuation of -6dB. Each multiplicaton with 2 equals an amplification of +6dB. A value of 0.0f is interpreted as zero volume and the channel is effectively disabled.
